title: Spacious 2 bedroom $1875 special, move in asap !!
posting_body: Slip away into a cozy oasis in our pet-friendly one or two bedroom apartments at Parkwood.
Open your front door to a sprawling floor plan and be greeted by crisp air conditioning.

This gated living destination is packed with plenty of storage opportunities, comfortable interiors, and stylish upgrades (in select homes), including hardwood-like flooring and brand new countertops.
Beyond your front door is a blend of indoor-outdoor spaces to level up your life.
Go for a dip in either of our two private swimming pools or energize yourself with a workout in our fitness center.
Choose any of our spacious floor plans at Parkwood and find a life of comfort in the Antelope Valley.
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
